holidays.title: National Friendship Day
holidays.description: Friendships are the purest type of human relationships. Let's celebrate the importance of loving platonic relationships.

holidays.title: National Root Beer Float Day
holidays.description: Today, enjoy the tallest, fizziest root beer float you can find!

holidays.title: National Sisters Day
holidays.description: Sisters have a deep connection that grows throughout childhood and remains strong throughout life.

holidays.title: American Family Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates the bonds that laid the foundation for our lives, be it blood or otherwise.

holidays.title: Balloons to Heaven Day
holidays.description: Here's to never forgetting and hoping strengthened legislation prevails. Pledge to end gun violence today.

holidays.title: Bolivia Independence Day
holidays.description: Get your red, yellow, and green out because it’s Bolivia Independence Day

holidays.title: Celebrations of San Salvador
holidays.description: Celebrate the Divine Savior of the World with the Celebrations of San Salvador.

holidays.title: Farmworker Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Be ready to raise awareness about the importance of farmworkers on this special day!

holidays.title: Fiesta de San Salvador
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate all things Salvador and the Transfiguration of Jesus Christ on Fiesta de San Salvador!

holidays.title: Fiesta Patronales Holiday
holidays.description: Join the celebrations for the Divine Saviour of the World on Fiesta Patronales Day.

holidays.title: Hiroshima Day
holidays.description: On Hiroshima Day, we remember one of the deadliest days in recent history.

holidays.title: International Sailor Moon Day
holidays.description: Calling all manga and anime lovers to celebrate International Sailor Moon Day.

holidays.title: Jamaica Independence Day
holidays.description: It’s Jamaica Independence Day! Prepare your black, yellow, and green apparel for this celebration.

holidays.title: National Carolyn Day
holidays.description: Let’s honor everyone with the name Carolyn this National Carolyn Day.

holidays.title: National Fresh Breath Day
holidays.description: Avoid a social faux pas and check if your breath is minty fresh.

holidays.title: National Henry Day
holidays.description: Hi there, Henry. Today is your day, so let’s find out more about your name!

holidays.title: National Tree Day
holidays.description: Learn how Arbor Day originated and found its way to Australia to become National Tree Day.

holidays.title: National Wiggle Your Toes Day
holidays.description: Show off your digits on National Wiggle Your Toes Day. Let’s see those piggies!

holidays.title: Psychic Day
holidays.description: This day recognizes the power of psychics and raises awareness about this ability.

holidays.title: Andy Warhol’s Birthday
holidays.description: This artist’s finest achievement was elevating his character to the status of a pop icon.

holidays.title: Elliott Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: He was a multi-instrumentalist who could play the piano and guitar and had a distinct voice.

holidays.title: Leslie Odom Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: From his music and acting to everything in between, read on for more on Odom.

holidays.title: Lucille Ball’s Birthday
holidays.description: She will be remembered as the goofy and lovable Lucy Ricardo forever.

holidays.title: Ty Simpkins’s Birthday
holidays.description: Curious about Ty Simpkins? You’ve come to the right place. Celebrate his special day right here.

holidays.title: Veronica Merrell’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about Veronica Merrell of The Merrell Twins.
